languages.text: "Это не... Слушаюсь!" {n}Брови Соломона взлетают вверх. Окаменев лицом, он молча салютует вам и с болезненно прямой спиной покидает кабинет.{/n}
"That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это не... Слушаюсь!" {n}Брови Соломона взлетают вверх. Окаменев лицом, он молча салютует вам и с болезненно прямой спиной покидает кабинет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

"That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas ce que je... Comme il vous plaira, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! » {n}s'exclame Solomorne en haussant les sourcils. Son visage reste de marbre lorsqu'il vous salue et quitte le bureau en se tenant exagérément droit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas ce que je... Comme il vous plaira, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! » {n}s'exclame Solomorne en haussant les sourcils. Son visage reste de marbre lorsqu'il vous salue et quitte le bureau en se tenant exagérément droit.{/n}

languages.text: 「そんなつもりでは…ローグトレーダーのお望みのままに」{n}ソロモーンの眉が跳ね上がった。彼の表情は石のように硬かった。黙って敬礼すると、痛々しいほど背筋を伸ばして書斎を後にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そんなつもりでは…ローグトレーダーのお望みのままに」{n}ソロモーンの眉が跳ね上がった。彼の表情は石のように硬かった。黙って敬礼すると、痛々しいほど背筋を伸ばして書斎を後にした。{/n}

languages.text: «Eso no es lo que... ¡Como ordene, Comerciante Independiente!» {n}Solomorne arquea las cejas bruscamente. Con rostro pétreo, se cuadra y abandona el estudio con la espalda dolorosamente recta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso no es lo que... ¡Como ordene, Comerciante Independiente!» {n}Solomorne arquea las cejas bruscamente. Con rostro pétreo, se cuadra y abandona el estudio con la espalda dolorosamente recta.{/n}

languages.text: “我不是这个……如你所愿，行商浪人！”{n}索罗蒙扬起了眉毛，随后，他面无表情地向你默默敬了个礼，痛苦地挺直了身子，离开了书房。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不是这个……如你所愿，行商浪人！”{n}索罗蒙扬起了眉毛，随后，他面无表情地向你默默敬了个礼，痛苦地挺直了身子，离开了书房。{/n}

languages.text: "Hayır, aslında... Başüstüne Hür Tacir!" {n}Solomorne, kaşlarını hayretle kaldırıyor. Sessizce selam dururken yüzü taş kesiyor ve dimdik durmaya çalışarak odadan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, aslında... Başüstüne Hür Tacir!" {n}Solomorne, kaşlarını hayretle kaldırıyor. Sessizce selam dururken yüzü taş kesiyor ve dimdik durmaya çalışarak odadan ayrılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist nicht der Grund, warum ich ... Wie Ihr wünscht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!" {n}Solomorne reißt die Augen auf. Er salutiert mit versteinerter Miene vor dir und verlässt das Arbeitszimmer mit schmerzendem Rücken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That's not what I... As you will, Rogue Trader!" {n}Solomorne's eyebrows fly upward. His face is stony as he silently salutes you and leaves the study with a painfully straight back.{/n}
